recipe.title: Chile-Garlic Shrimp
ingredients: 2 pounds large shrimp, shelled and deveined
2 dried red chiles (plus more for garnish, if desired)
instructions: Heat oil in a medium sauté pan over high heat. Sauté garlic until browned, about 2 minutes. Add shrimp and chiles; sauté until shrimp are cooked through, about 4 minutes. Add brandy and cook 1 minute more. Remove from heat. Transfer to a platter or divide equally among 8 small plates. Sprinkle with parsley, add salt to taste and serve.
